import React, { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import spinner from '../../img/spinner.gif' const Profile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ adopting:'', petOwner:'', selling:'', company:'', location:'', favePet:'', images:'', youtube:'', facbook:'', instagram:'' }) const { adopting, petOwner, selling, company, location, favePet, images, youtube, facbook, instagram } = formData return loading && profile === null ? ( ) : (
